name: partybusprep
displayName: let Mark know you're ready to party.
description: Mark's ordered a bus. Let's get people moving.

dialogue:
'Hi again $player.'
'That was quite a job with the zombies, thanks!'
'As I said earlier, I think it's time we all had a break.'
'I've ordered a bus to take us all out. It should be waiting outside ready to go.'
'Can you ask as many people as possible to go to the bus as soon as they can and then wait for the rest there?'
'Once we have a dozen or more of the team on board (including yourself), it'll be time to head off.'

locations.name: bus
locations.description:
You're on the 'party bus'!
It's a small hired coach - not much to distinguish it really.
You need to encourage as many people as you can to head over here to start our celebrations.
